Title: Fantastic Four Vol. 1 #1
Author: Stan Lee
Description: The groundbreaking first appearance of Marvel's First Family as cosmic rays grant them amazing powers during a space mission. Reed Richards, Sue Storm, Johnny Storm, and Ben Grimm must learn to harness their abilities while confronting the mysterious Mole Man.

Title: Amazing Spider-Man Vol. 1 #1
Author: Stan Lee
Description: Following his debut in Amazing Fantasy #15, Peter Parker continues his journey as the amazing Spider-Man. The web-slinger faces off against the Chameleon while trying to join the Fantastic Four and dealing with his new double life.

Title: The Incredible Hulk Vol. 1 #1
Author: Stan Lee
Description: Scientist Bruce Banner is caught in a gamma bomb explosion and transforms into the incredible Hulk. His monstrous alter-ego emerges at nightfall, beginning one of Marvel's most tragic and enduring character arcs.

Title: Journey Into Mystery Vol. 1 #83
Author: Stan Lee
Description: Disabled doctor Donald Blake discovers an ancient walking stick that transforms him into the mighty Thor, God of Thunder. This landmark issue introduces Norse mythology into the Marvel Universe, beginning Thor's epic saga.

Title: The Silver Surfer Vol. 1 #1
Author: Stan Lee
Description: Cosmic wanderer Norrin Radd reflects on his sacrifice and exile on Earth as the Silver Surfer. This philosophical series explores his perspective as an alien observer of humanity while delving into his origins as Galactus's herald.

Title: X-Men Vol. 1 #1
Author: Stan Lee
Description: Professor Charles Xavier assembles five young mutants with extraordinary powers to protect a world that fears and hates them. This landmark first issue introduces Cyclops, Marvel Girl, Beast, Angel, and Iceman as they confront the villainous Magneto.

Title: Iron Man Vol. 1 #1
Author: Archie Goodwin
Description: Industrialist Tony Stark continues his adventures in high-tech armor after transitioning from Tales of Suspense. This debut solo issue pits the Golden Avenger against the sinister Half-Face while exploring the man inside the machine.

Title: Daredevil Vol. 1 #1
Author: Stan Lee
Description: Blinded by radioactive material, Matt Murdock develops enhanced senses and becomes the crimson-clad defender of Hell's Kitchen. The Man Without Fear makes his striking debut as he investigates his father's murder and confronts the villainous Fixer.

Title: Black Panther Vol. 1 #1
Author: Jack Kirby
Description: King T'Challa returns to his technologically advanced African nation of Wakanda after adventures with the Fantastic Four. The Black Panther must protect his homeland from the villainous Killmonger in this groundbreaking solo series by comics legend Jack Kirby.

Title: Doctor Strange Vol. 1 #1
Author: Steve Englehart
Description: Master of the Mystic Arts Stephen Strange defends reality from otherworldly threats from his Sanctum Sanctorum. This psychedelic series follows the former surgeon as he navigates interdimensional mysteries and confronts supernatural forces beyond mortal comprehension.

Title: Superman Vol. 1 #1
Author: Jerry Siegel
Description: Following his debut in Action Comics #1, the Man of Steel receives his own groundbreaking series. This historic issue establishes Superman's mythology as he battles social injustice and brings the nascent superhero genre to new heights.

Title: Batman Vol. 1 #1
Author: Bill Finger
Description: The Dark Knight Detective gets his own series following successful appearances in Detective Comics. This landmark issue features the first appearances of the Joker and Catwoman, establishing two of comics' most enduring villains.

Title: Wonder Woman Vol. 1 #1
Author: William Moulton Marston
Description: Amazon princess Diana brings her message of peace, justice, and feminine strength to Man's World. This groundbreaking issue establishes Wonder Woman's mythology and introduces her iconic lasso of truth, bulletproof bracelets, and invisible plane.

Title: The Flash Vol. 1 #105
Author: John Broome
Description: Police scientist Barry Allen continues his adventures as the Scarlet Speedster in this Silver Age revival. This issue marks the return of the Flash's own title as he uses his super-speed powers to battle rogues and protect Central City.

Title: Green Lantern Vol. 2 #1
Author: John Broome
Description: Test pilot Hal Jordan wields the power ring of the Green Lantern Corps in this Silver Age reinvention. This cosmic series follows Earth's emerald guardian as he balances his responsibilities to his sector and the intergalactic peacekeeping force.

Title: Spawn Vol. 1 #1
Author: Todd McFarlane
Description: Murdered government agent Al Simmons returns from Hell as the demonic antihero Spawn to find his wife remarried and his life in ruins. This groundbreaking series follows his violent quest for redemption as he battles between Heaven and Hell while confronting his limited hellpower reserves.

Title: Saga Vol. 1 #1
Author: Brian K. Vaughan
Description: Star-crossed lovers from warring alien races flee across the galaxy with their newborn daughter. This acclaimed space opera combines science fiction, fantasy, and romance in a boundary-pushing narrative about family and survival against impossible odds.

Title: The Walking Dead Vol. 1 #1
Author: Robert Kirkman
Description: Police officer Rick Grimes awakens from a coma to find the world overrun by zombies and his family missing. This landmark horror series begins his harrowing journey through an apocalyptic landscape where the living may be more dangerous than the dead.

Title: Witchblade Vol. 1 #1
Author: David Wohl
Description: NYPD detective Sara Pezzini becomes bonded with the ancient weapon known as the Witchblade. This mystical gauntlet grants her supernatural powers to battle criminals and supernatural threats while uncovering the artifact's mysterious past.

Title: Invincible Vol. 1 #1
Author: Robert Kirkman
Description: Teenager Mark Grayson discovers he's inherited superpowers from his father, the world's greatest superhero. This fresh take on the superhero genre combines coming-of-age drama with increasingly violent action as Mark becomes the hero known as Invincible.
